content: Industrial tools provider W W Grainger Inc  said on Thursday that its board had approved a plan to buy back $3 billion in shares over the next three years.
name: WW Grainger Inc
title: W W Grainger announces $3 billion share buyback plan; profit misses

content: April 16 Industrial tools provider W W Grainger Inc said on Thursday that its board had approved a plan to buy back $3 billion in shares over the next three years.
name: WW Grainger Inc
title: UPDATE 1-W W Grainger announces $3 bln share buyback plan; profit misses
